name: CELL WARP / セルワープ
description:
CELL WARP is a puzzle game where you move by warping to portals.

I would like to explore this game more. I spent most of the game jam programming and helping run our local LD gathering and didn't have much time left for puzzle design.

Made for Ludum Dare 45.

NOTE: Please rate me low in the THEME category. I was brainstorming ideas for the potential themes the day before LD, and the one I came up with for Unconventional Travel really resonated with me and I wanted to make it.

CONTROLS
  • Click on Portals : Move 
  • WASD/Arrow : Strike
  • R : Restart
CREDITS
  • Cory Martin : Design, Code, Art
  • Russell Mehringer : SFX
  • Ross David Cooper : Music
